DES External works to match existing
description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 4 October 2022 (RN:22/01317/FULL) for the Installation of air vents within facades for mechanical ventilation and heat recovery plant; replacement windows with double glazed timber framed sash windows; roof insulation; installation of photovoltaic cells to the roof; provision of fan assisted smoke extract ventilation at roof level; alterations to and replacement of roof level balustrades and terrace screens; and provision of dry riser inlets. Namely, provision of Air Source Heat Pumps within louvred and brick screened enclosures at roof level.
